overview: A welcome as warning, AlienNATION [star spangled], asks viewers if theyâ€™ve ever wondered how to be here? How to leave? How to arrive? Then presents an eerie, guilt ridden, yet self-congratulatory stew of televised recordings of public apologies to Indigenous peoples from the heads of state of settler-colonial nations around the globe.
title: AlienNATION [star spangled]
